subject: Detailed plant view
message: It would be nice to be able to click on one of the plant “cards” and have it bring up more detailed information about the plants.  Maybe a map of the native range.  A few options for where to buy the seeds.  A list of the animals it’s connected to, like a host plant for example.
userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_6_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/18.6 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1
